member.name: T:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart
member.summary: A ReCaptcha Invisible content part.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.Badge
member.summary: The position of the reCAPTCHA badge.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.TabIndex
member.summary: The tabindex of the challenge. If other elements in your page use tabindex, it should be set to make user navigation easier.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.FormId
member.summary: The Id of the form that this ReCaptcha is protecting.
member.remarks: If is specified the value of this property will be ignored. If Callback is not specified a form id is required.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.Callback
member.summary: The name of your callback function, executed when the user submits a successful response. The g-recaptcha-response token is passed to your callback.
member.remarks: If left empty a form Id is required and the part will render a script that will submit the form with the given Id.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.ExpiredCallback
member.summary: The name of your callback function, executed when the reCAPTCHA response expires and the user needs to re-verify.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.ErrorCallback
member.summary: The name of your callback function, executed when reCAPTCHA encounters an error (usually network connectivity) and cannot continue until connectivity is restored. If you specify a function here, you are responsible for informing the user that they should retry.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.ContentText
member.summary: The content / text that will be rendered inside the submit button.

member.name: P:Griesoft.OrchardCore.ReCaptcha.Models.RecaptchaInvisiblePart.TagType
member.summary: The tag type that this element should be rendered as.
